item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "Unbeing dead isn't being alive." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Novalis
item.description: "Poetry heals the wounds inflicted by reason." -- Novalis

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naïve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Human beings are not born once and for all on the day their mothers give birth to them, but ... life obliges them over and over again to give birth to themselves." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "She felt the abyss of disenchantment." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "The adolescents of my generation, greedy for life, forgot in body and soul about their hopes for the future until reality taught them that tomorrow was not what they had dreamed, and they discovered nostalgia." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you read someone else's diary, you get what you deserve." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Hugh and I have been together for so long that in order to arouse extraordinary passion, we need to engage in physical combat. Once, he hit me on the back of the head with a broken wineglass, and I fell to the floor pretending to be unconscious. That was romantic, or would have been had he rushed to my side rather than stepping over my body to fetch the dustpan." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Most people would have found it grotesque, but when you're in love nothing is so abstract or horrible that it can't be thought of as cute." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "This left me alone to solve the coffee problem - a sort of catch-22, as in order to think straight I need caffeine, and in order to make that happen I need to think straight." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Sometimes,' said Pooh, 'the smallest things take up the most room in your heart." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?" -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If the person you are talking to doesn't appear to be listening, be patient. It may simply be that he has a small piece of fluff in his ear." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Just because an animal is large, it doesn't mean he doesn't want kindness; however big Tigger seems to be, remember that he wants as much kindness as Roo." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Naciulinda add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White
